lead_paragraph: San Antonio's first play of the 2008-09 season was designed and executed perfectly. Spurs' center Tim Duncan didn't bother jumping for the opening tap, conceding it to Phoenix's Shaquille O'Neal. Five seconds later, Michael Finley wrapped his arms around O'Neal for an intentional foul.

headline.main: Impact Hack-a-Someone Tactic Having on NBA Is Growing Issue
headline.print_headline: Impact Hack-a-Someone Tactic Having on NBA Is Growing Issue
